definition: sick note/medical certificate for sick leave
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Arising tone can not be used here.
sentences.chinese: 相比看北京病假條這兒不能用升調。

sentences.english: his anxious mother would ask, and I would print it out and sign it.
sentences.chinese: 他焦慮的母親會問道，我便給他們打印病假條並簽字。

sentences.english: Do you know anyone who can forge a sick note for me?
sentences.chinese: 你知道誰可以幫我虛開一張病假條？

sentences.english: Here's a sick note for three days.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張三天的病假條。

sentences.english: I wrote my own sick note excusing myself from music lessons.
sentences.chinese: 我寫了病假條，希望可以得到允許不去上音樂課。
